Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at tommie Hudson Square, you'll be centrally located in New York, steps from New York City Fire Museum and minutes from Canal Park. This 4-star hotel is close to New York University and Brooklyn Bridge.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 325 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional features include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and complimentary use of a nearby fitness facility.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 3 meeting rooms available for events.


Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

New York City Fire Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Canal Park - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Children's Museum of the Arts - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Washington Market Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
West Fourth Street Courts - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Hudson River Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Collect Pond Park - 1 km / 0.6 mi

Mott Street - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
African Burial Ground National Monument - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Museum of Chinese in Americas - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
New York University - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
New Museum - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
City Hall Park - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
New York, NY (JRB-Downtown Manhattan Heliport) - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia) - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Newark, NJ (EWR-Liberty Intl.) - 14.8 km / 9.2 mi

The preferred airport for tommie Hudson Square is New York, NY (LGA-LaGuardia).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
